title: Assessing the use of the triglyceride-glycemic index (TyG), neutrophil-lymphocyte Ratio (NLR), and platelet-lymphocyte Ratio (PLR) in distinguishing benign and malignant tumors among patients with complaints of breast mass
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Hamrish Kumar Rajakumar, Varsha Coimbatore Sathyabal, Thilaga Thamilarasan, Pushpa Balamurugesan, Gayathri Ganesan
